channel.title: Help..?
channel.description:
Well.. I have a few problems I need help with.
First off.. Most 317's only have shrimp, lobster, shark, and manta's as cooking items.. but, I added pizza's, pie's, and the rest of the fish, now, how would I make these heal, when ate?
Secondly, I am using most custom areas, I made myself throughout the server.. Thus my makeGlobalObject, and deletethatobject methods are getting to big, and lagging my server really bad.. How would I make a handler for this, to stop the lag?
Third, and final.. I am using a blurr's client, and the cache is all messed up, and I added models.. so it messed it up even more.. Few examples..
Kbd is a cat.. Gates are revenants.. Green Dragons are people.. Fences are runner hats.. pest control steps are supreme claws.. pest control boat walls are wretched staffs.. and wretched armor is all over the pest control island..
Please help in anyway you can..
Thanks, Grim.

item.title: Help..?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

No, the problem is that KBD is already fixed in the client, there is no need for KBD to be in class5 or any other class, because if it’s in any other class it will scuff up.

Read full topic

item.title: Help..?
item.dc:creator: @iaboni iaboni
item.description:
@iaboni wrote:

Well if the client was working without the models best solution is to delete the models you downloaded and find new ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Help..?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

Class8 is for items… Class 5 is for NPC’s. Don’t give advice if it will ruin things…

Read full topic

item.title: Help..?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

KBD shouldn’t be in Class5.

Read full topic

item.title: Help..?
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Well, heres my kbd code in class5.java

    if(i == 50)
    {
        aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
        class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
        class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
        class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";
        class5.aString65 = "King Black Dragon";
        class5.anInt61 = 276;
        class5.aByteArray89 = "A fierce dragon with black scales.".getBytes();
        class5.anIntArray94 = new int[6];
        class5.anIntArray94[0] = 9428;
        class5.anIntArray94[1] = 9427;
        class5.anIntArray94[2] = 9426;
        class5.anIntArray94[3] = 9425;
        class5.anIntArray94[4] = 9424;
        class5.anIntArray94[5] = 9423;
    }

Which one of the anIntArray’s would be the model id so I could replace the model for the actual kbd…?

Read full topic

item.title: Help..?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

To sort the KBD is a cat problem, you need to go into your client, then into class5.java, find cat, then change the part that sais npcid == 50 because your cat will be ID 50 if it’s turning up as a KBD, its the same with the other problems.

To add the food, search for the message you get when you eat the food in server files, then just add the same for pizzas and pies. You may notice something about boosting HP in the sharks, copy that over.

You can’t do anything about the objects, if there are loads in one place, then you have too many, but other than that, no solution i’m afraid.

Read full topic
